an3.88:1.1: “Sadhikamidam, bhikkhave, diyaddhasikkhapadasatam anvaddhamasam uddesam agacchati yattha attakama kulaputta sikkhanti.
an3.88:1.2: Tisso ima, bhikkhave, sikkha yatthetam sabbam samodhanam gacchati.
an3.88:1.5: ima kho, bhikkhave, tisso sikkha yatthetam sabbam samodhanam gacchati.
an3.88:2.1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim paripurakari pannaya paripurakari.
an3.88:2.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.88:2.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.88:2.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.88:2.6: So asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an3.88:2.7: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti.
an3.88:2.8: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya upahaccaparinibbayi hoti.
an3.88:2.9: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an3.88:2.10: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an3.88:2.11: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya uddhamsoto hoti akanitthagami.
an3.88:2.12: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya, ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.88:2.13: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ekabiji hoti, ekamyeva manusakam bhavam nibbattetva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.88:2.14: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya kolankolo hoti, dve va tini va kulani sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.88:2.15: Tam va pana anabhisambhavam appativijjham tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sattakkhattuparamo hoti, sattakkhattuparamam deve ca manusse ca sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.88:3.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, paripuram paripurakari aradheti padesam padesakari.
